alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 11:42AM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOWSTORM CONTINUES... .Heavy snow is beginning to wind down as center of low pressure moves east into the northwest Atlantic. The heaviest snowfall will continue across much of western Maine and Seacoast New Hampshire through early afternoon before tapering off. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 7 to 13 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Significant snowfall up to a foot of snow will bring a period of impacts. Moderate snow with periods of heavy snow will create hazardous travel conditions across the region.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
